about:
Hi there, my name is Michelle Wong and this is my website! I am a recent graduate from the University of Toronto focusing in Computer Science and Mathematics. I am passionate in developing my software skills, and also helping others! My hobbies include mahjong, rhythm games, and dancing.

You can contact me at: chellewsa@gmail.com.

project_list.name: React Website
project_list.desc: I made this website in React! This has been something I wanted to try doing for a while; ever since I created my first website years ago using purely HTML and CSS.

project_list.name: Discord Bot
project_list.desc: I made this bot for my school. It was used to help out with courses and shuttle bus routes.

project_list.name: Filename Scrambler
project_list.desc: Small little bash script I wrote to help manage my background images.

project_list.name: DDR Scores Tracker
project_list.desc: I made this sideproject for my hobby of playing DDR. I've been meaning to have a portable way of keeping track of my scores, and the sentiment goes to a bunch of others who play it. There are a couple of apps for this out already but I also wanted to have an AI function to it since the break time between songs is very short, putting in the info seems cumbersome when I fat finger the numbers. Written with a Xamarin framework, it uses AWS to analyze photos and Realm as its database.

project_list.name: Web App
project_list.desc: A side project I want to make in the future that lets me play around with the different web frameworks out there.
